name: Glute Bridge
instructions: Lie on back, knees bent. Drive hips up, squeeze glutes, pause, lower under control.

name: Barbell Hip Thrust
instructions: Upper back on bench; bar over hips; drive hips up to neutral; avoid overextension.

name: Frog Pump
instructions: Soles together, knees out; pulse hips up with glute squeeze.

name: Kettlebell Swing
instructions: Hinge at hips; snap hips to drive bell to chest height; keep spine neutral.

name: Romanian Deadlift
instructions: Hinge with soft knees; slide bar along thighs; feel hamstring stretch; neutral back.

name: Nordic Ham Curl
instructions: Kneel with ankles fixed; lower body slowly; push back up with minimal hands.

name: Seated Hamstring Curl
instructions: Pad above heels; curl pad down; pause and return with control.

name: Single-Leg RDL (DB)
instructions: Balance on one leg; hinge at hips; keep hips square; stand tall.

name: Back Squat
instructions: Feet shoulder-width; brace; sit between hips; drive up through mid-foot.

name: Front Squat
instructions: Elbows high; torso tall; squat to depth; keep heels down.

name: Goblet Squat
instructions: Hold DB at chest; sit down between hips; keep chest proud.

name: Leg Press
instructions: Feet mid-sled; lower until thighs ~90°; press without locking knees.

name: Pull-Up
instructions: From dead hang, pull chest to bar; control down fully.

name: Lat Pulldown
instructions: Pull bar to upper chest; elbows drive down; avoid leaning back excessively.

name: Bent-Over Row (BB)
instructions: Hinge torso; row to lower ribs; keep neck neutral.

name: One-Arm Row (DB)
instructions: Support on bench; pull DB to hip; pause; control down.

name: Push-Up
instructions: Hands under shoulders; straight body line; chest to floor; press up.

name: Barbell Bench Press
instructions: Shoulders set; bar to mid-chest; press to lockout without flaring.

name: Incline Dumbbell Press
instructions: Bench 30–45°; lower to chest line; press with control.

name: Cable Fly
instructions: Slight forward lean; sweep handles to meet; slow stretch back.

name: Overhead Press (DB)
instructions: Press overhead; ribs down; control descent.

name: Lateral Raise (DB)
instructions: Raise to shoulder height; soft elbows; slow down phase.

name: Arnold Press
instructions: Rotate palms from facing-in to forward as you press; control.

name: Face Pull
instructions: Rope to nose/eye line; elbows high; squeeze rear delts.

name: Barbell Curl
instructions: Elbows fixed; curl up; control down; avoid swinging.

name: Hammer Curl (DB)
instructions: Neutral grip; curl; squeeze at top; slow lower.

name: Incline DB Curl
instructions: Bench inclined; let arms stretch; curl without shoulders rolling.

name: Cable Curl
instructions: Elbows close; curl through full range; steady tempo.

name: Triceps Pushdown
instructions: Elbows tucked; extend fully; avoid shoulder swing.

name: Overhead Triceps Extension (DB)
instructions: Arms overhead; lower DB behind head; extend smoothly.

name: Close-Grip Bench Press
instructions: Grip just inside shoulder width; touch mid-chest; press.

name: Bench Dips
instructions: Hands on bench; lower until elbows ~90°; press up.

name: Dead Bug
instructions: Opposite arm/leg extend; keep lower back gently pressed to floor; move slowly.

name: Plank
instructions: Elbows under shoulders; squeeze glutes; breathe; keep straight line.

name: Pallof Press
instructions: Stand sideways to cable; press handle out; resist rotation.

name: Hanging Leg Raise
instructions: Hang from bar; lift legs without swinging; control down.

name: Ab Wheel Rollout
instructions: Kneel; roll wheel forward under control; brace core; pull back.

name: Standing Calf Raise
instructions: Rise onto toes; pause; lower through full range.

name: Seated Calf Raise
instructions: Pad on thighs; raise heels; pause; slow lower.

name: Dumbbell Calf Raise
instructions: Hold DBs at sides; rise to toes; control descent.

name: Single-Leg Calf Raise
instructions: Balance on one foot; hold support if needed; full range each rep.

name: Banded Glute Bridge
instructions: Mini-band above knees; drive hips up and push knees out.

name: Banded Monster Walk
instructions: Mini-band above ankles; slight squat; step diagonally keeping knees out.

name: Banded RDL
instructions: Stand on band, hold ends; hinge at hips keeping spine neutral.

name: Banded Leg Curl
instructions: Anchor band, loop at ankles; curl heel to glute with control.

name: Banded Squat
instructions: Mini-band above knees; squat while maintaining knee alignment outwards.

name: Banded Row
instructions: Anchor band at chest height; pull elbows back, squeeze scapulae.

name: Banded Lat Pulldown (Door Anchor)
instructions: Kneel; pull band to chest, control up.

name: Banded Chest Press
instructions: Anchor behind; press forward similar to cable press.

name: Banded Face Pull
instructions: Anchor at eye level; pull to nose line with elbows high.

name: Banded Lateral Raise
instructions: Stand on band; raise arms to shoulder height with soft elbows.

name: Banded Biceps Curl
instructions: Stand on band; curl handles up, keep elbows by sides.

name: Banded Triceps Pressdown
instructions: Anchor overhead; extend elbows down, avoid shoulder movement.

name: Banded Pallof Press
instructions: Stand sideways to anchor; press band out, resist rotation.

name: Banded Calf Raise
instructions: Loop band under forefoot and over shoulder; rise onto toes.
